titleStmt.title: The devout soules search with the happie issue of comfort found : in a sermon, preached at Paules Crosse, Ian. 14. 1610 / by Thomas Myriell ...
titleStmt.author: Myriell, Thomas, d. 1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shoppe, at the great South dore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College (University of Cambridge). Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe, at the great South dore of Paules
